settings.text_1: Upgrade to xTool M1 Ultra and save big

settings.card_desc: Diode Laser for Engraving and Cutting
Versatile Tools for Cutting and Foiling
Vivid Ink for Rich Color Printing
Various Pens for Auto Drawing and Writing

settings.title: The Ultimate 4-in-1 Craft & DIY Machine
settings.desc: It's a laser machine, a die cutting machine, a printer, and a drawing robot. A one-stop studio that meets almost all crafting needs. You can do pretty much anything with a single device!

settings.text_2: Diode Laser for Engraving and Cutting
settings.video2_text_2: Switchable laser head up to 20W. Effortlessly slice through materials up to 10mm thick in one smooth pass.
settings.img1_text_2: Focused down to a tiny dot, laser precision is sharper than you can imagine, achieving at the micron level - all your details are captured perfectly.
settings.video3_text_2: RA2 Pro lets you engrave on just about anything round or curved. Party favors, sports gear, you name it - turn everyday items into seriously cool, custom creations.

settings.card_text2: Premium delicate cutting for 1.5mm paper, stickers, vinyl and more
Power through thick materials up to 2.5mm, ideal for leather, matboard, and even balsa wood
Glides through fabrics like denim, cotton, and linen
Create stunning foil accents or add elegant debossing to paper, cardstock, leather and more

settings.text_2: Versatile Tools for Cutting and Foiling
settings.video2_text_2: M1 Ultra has your back with its revolutionary Pin-point Positioning™️ tech, which is 10 times more accurate than single-camera systems. Now you can tackle even the most delicate crafting tasks with total ease.
Open up a whole new world of possibilities! It's simple to express your artistic vision on unconventional media like wood, clay, coated stone, fabric, and more.
settings.img1_text_1: Rich Colors to Pop Your Work
settings.img1_text_2: With CMY ink technology, we create stunningly colorful prints, enhancing the vibrancy of your creations.

settings.text_2: Various Pens for Auto Drawing & Writing
settings.video2_text_2: Enjoy the drawing pens which are capable of precise strokes, smooth fills, and a wide range of customization options, as long as they fit the pen holder.

settings.card_desc: Stand out with stunning multicolor designs that go beyond the basic engraving and cuts of traditional laser machines.
M1 Ultra excels at cutting, drawing, and foiling as well as printing and engraving like a dream! Perfect for mixed-media, perfect for art.
From wood to clay, leather, and stone, we are redefining the boundaries of inkjet printing- thick and hard materials are no longer a limitation.

settings.title: Smart Combos, Simple Success
settings.desc: 3 seconds is all you need to switch processes with Easy Swap™ Design. No more jumping to devices - get your work done with ultimate efficiency and precision.

settings.title: Learn Once, Master All
settings.content: Forget the frustration of using multiple machines. With xTool powerful software, everything is a breeze. Just set it up and go!

settings.title: Space Saving, No Clutter
settings.content: Say bye bye to redundant devices and welcome the compact design, M1 Ultra perfectly provides efficiency and a clean workspace.

settings.title: Fabric

From soft to hard, thin to thick, and flat to 3D curved surfaces, it's designed to meet all your everyday crafting needs. Let your imagination run wild and M1 Ultra is ready to make it happen.

settings.text_2: Less mess, more masterpieces! Every cut, shape, and detail is flawless. No more frustrating mistakes or wasted materials. Craft like a pro in no time!

settings.card_desc: Different ways to style your sweet home
Wow your guests with special items
Make heartfelt gifts they will treasure
Turn your passion into profits and earn more

settings.top_title: Your Smart Choice for Year-Round Crafting

settings.title: Choose the module
settings.content: place the materials you're gonna craft and install the module

settings.title: Choose pattern and processing
settings.content: Get inspired or create your own patterns, select the corresponding processing mode or combination processing

settings.title: Press to start and done
settings.content: Switch your module according to the guide if necessary

settings.title: Craft with Confidence, Easy for All
settings.content: We put your experience first. While our machine boasts numerous functions, it remains incredibly easy to use. Anyone can be a creative genius with this user-friendly machine.

settings.text_2: Snap pics on your phone, poof! They're in the app, ready to edit. See exactly what you're working with and total precision for amazing edits.

settings.innovation_desc: It effortlessly juggles multiple processes across multiple functions, streamlining your workflow in one setup.
One-click to set optimal parameters, no more testing and wasting materials to get the desired engraving results.
All patterns and lines are in your control. Redraw, rewrite, remix... your imagination is the only limit.
With just a few words, AI can generate laser-ready designs, offering over 10 style options.

settings.card_desc: We Enhanced Every Detail for Your Enjoyment
One-Stop Solution for All Your Crafting Needs

settings.title: Details for Your Best Experience
settings.desc: We believe that every detail counts. That's why we've built our product with the utmost care and precision. Inside, you'll discover a world of thoughtful design and exceptional performance.

settings.title: Reduce Screw Disassembly Steps
settings.content: We reduce screw usage and upgrade to the clips designs for effortless assembly and module replacement.

settings.title: Smart Ink Cap Placement
settings.content: Never worry about dried-up ink again. The inkjet module automatically seals itself after each job, keeping your ink fresh and your printer ready for action!

settings.title: Extra Storage, Keep Tools Handy
settings.content: Keep your essentials tools and materials handy and organized with our hidden storage space conveniently on the riser base.

settings.title: We Enhanced Every Detail for Your Enjoyment
settings.footer_title: High Quality Ensured by Professional Testing.
settings.footer_txt: Rigorously tested for uncompromising quality and longevity. Your peace of mind is our top priority, ensuring a worry-free creative experience every time.

settings.title: Lid-open Stop to Avoid Danger
settings.content: If the machine is moved, struck, or the machine cover is opened during operation, the machine will automatically stop.

settings.title: Effective Smoke Extract System
settings.content: To protect health, an excellent smoke exhaust system (5400 rpm) and pre-filters quickly discharge the harmful gases produced by laser processing.

settings.title: Light Filtering Lid to Protect Your Eyes
settings.content: The large, high-transparency cover offers excellent light filtering (0.35% light left), enabling clear process observation without goggles.

For engraving and cutting thicker objects

settings.question: What is the working area of different modes?
Does it have a camera? How to align when processing?
settings.answer:
M1 Ultra doesn't have a built-in camera because the camera of this size machine may have an error of more than 5mm.

However, M1 Ultra has your back with its revolutionary Snapshot Preview and Pin-point PositioningTM tech, which is 10 times more accurate than single-camera systems.

settings.question: What's the ink type? Is it sublimation or normal ink？
settings.answer: Normal ink (DYE ink). We focus on direct printing and are exploring new solutions beyond the existing module.Stay tuned for future updates as we aim to bring more printheads for more versatile material printing!

settings.question: How long can each ink cartridge support printing?
settings.answer:
It can print patterns that fill 20 sheets of standard A4 paper at the default concentration.

The specific service life is related to printing color, concentration, ambient temperature, etc.

settings.question: Will it work with the xTool screen printer?
settings.answer: Of course! M1 Ultra is compatible with xTool Screen Printer small-sized frame (M Series). We can't wait to see all the amazing work you'll create with it!

settings.question: Is it compatible with xTool Creative Space Software and Lightburn?
settings.answer: M1 Ultra is a versatile craft machine. Lightburn is primarily designed for laser use, and connecting it would disable many features and result in a poor experience. Please use our official XCS software for the best performance.

settings.question: What materials can the inkjet module process?
settings.answer: It can print on fabrics, boards, printing paper, and other materials. However, it cannot print on very dense or smooth surfaces, such as metal, glass, and ceramics, because the ink cannot penetrate or adhere. These materials can be processed after applying a suitable ink coating.
